an4.86:1.1: “These four individuals are found in the world.
an4.86:1.3: One sunk low who sinks lower,
an4.86:1.4: one sunk low who rises high,
an4.86:1.5: one risen high who sinks low, and
an4.86:1.6: one risen high who rises higher.
an4.86:1.7: … These are the four individuals found in the world.”
